heading: WORKOUTS THAT DON'T SUCK
content: We're here to make you feel capable and confident with our right, updated equipments and various specifically designed programs  for both cardio and strength training.

heading: STRETCH YOUR LIMITS
content: Our workouts stretch your limits and help you define success for yourself.

heading: INFRASTRUCTURE
content: Alongside the equipments, we maintain an energetic, clean and cool environment to help you get ready for the calorie burn.

heading: ESCAPE MONOTONY
content: We provide the ever evolving workouts and a chance to enjoy them with like minded people who will push you to do your best.

heading: HELP ACHIEVE ZEN MIND
content: Facilities at the gym ensures that the member doesn't only receive adequate physical training but mental strengthening too. You'll have zen mind even before you know it.

heading: CANCEL ANYTIME
content: We understand that life throws unexpected surprises and sometimes makes us shift our priority on other urgent things.  With no time commitment or long term contract, cancel anytime
